SEARCH
Package com.safetynetalerts.api.repository

Class FirestationRepository

java.lang.Object
com.safetynetalerts.api.repository.FirestationRepository
@Repository public class FirestationRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing Firestation data. This class provides methods to retrieve, save, update, and delete firestation records. It also handles writing firestation data to JSON files.

    • getFirestation

      public List<Firestation> getFirestation()
      Retrieves the list of firestations from the data source.
      Returns:
      a list of Firestation, or null if an error occurs

    • saveFirestation

      public void saveFirestation(Firestation firestation)
      Saves a new firestation to the data source and writes the updated data to JSON.
      Parameters:
      firestation - the Firestation to save

    • updateFirestation

      public void updateFirestation(int index, Firestation firestation)
      Updates an existing firestation at the specified index and writes the updated data to JSON.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the firestation to update
      firestation - the updated Firestation object

    • deleteFirestation

      public void deleteFirestation(Firestation firestation)
      Deletes the specified firestation from the data source and writes the updated data to JSON.
      Parameters:
      firestation - the Firestation to delete

    • writeJSON

      public void writeJSON()
      Writes the current firestation data to a JSON file.
